title: Metabase Dashboard Cards Schema
description: JSON schema for dashboard cards (dashcards) in Metabase dashboard updates

id.description: Dashboard card ID. Use existing ID for updating existing cards, or negative values (-1, -2, -3, etc.) for new cards

card_id.description: ID of the card (question/chart) to add to the dashboard. Must be a valid 5-digit card ID from Metabase

col.description: Column position on the dashboard grid (0-23). Dashboard grid has 24 columns

row.description: Row position on the dashboard grid (0-based)

size_x.description: Width of the card in grid columns (1-24). Must not exceed grid boundaries when combined with col

size_y.description: Height of the card in grid rows (1 or more)

dashboard_tab_id.description: ID of the dashboard tab this card belongs to. Use null for single-tab dashboards

allOf.description: Ensure card doesn't exceed grid boundaries
